SetupÂ¶

The setup menus allow for the intuitive creation of numerous standard surfaces, nanoparticles, graphene and graphene nanoribbons, as well as nanotubes.

Along with creating the geometry within ase-gui, a button provides the necessary python code allowing one to recreate the exact same geometry in ASE scripts.
